arms, due to his all wheel drive system, he pries them open using nothing b=

, and recloses them as he gets in. He didn't care if he was discovered, thi=
s was it, he was going to make Hydras, Cyclonus, and Scourge pay for what w=
as done to his comrades. 

" Fun's over Hydras.."

emitter, and sends a highly painful disrupter wave throughout the fortress,=
 which only harms Predacon and Decepticon programming. The disrupter causes=
 massive vibration throughout the fortress. Nightshift feels it beneath his=
 feet, as he remains up on the rafters. He then catches his comrade's signa=
ture.

He jumps down from the rafters and calmly stops his speeding around,=

ew who was causing the vibrations and it was only a matter of time before e=
veryone felt the fury of Tucson Prime.

rom. You Predapunks are in trouble now. Biiiiiig trouble. I'm talkn' the ty=
pe of trouble that's gonna have all of ya slagged in a matter of minutes."

s manage to pry open the doors with a horrible screech. He opens them just =
enough to gain access into the room, and then lets them close. He turns on =
his high beams on his headlights, filling the room with light. Nightshift g=
ives a sly grin, and a chuckle while rubbing his hands together.

" Slaaaaa=

Tucson Prime nodds.

" I've come only to=
 take back what has been taken from the Autobots. our comrades, and our lea=
der. I have also come to redeem justice for my fellow Autobots and Maximals=
. Serious crimes have been committed here, and worst of all, against Primus=
 himself. No one betrays Primus. And for that betrayal, there will be punni=
shment. But not the type that you seem to enjoy, no, as Autobots we don't w=
ork that way. What fate has deemed right for you, that is what will be serv=
ed. And to those you have wronfully transformed into your personal puppets,=
 I will bright them to the light they desperately need to escape your tyran=
y."

He delves deep into his spiritual senses, becomming one with the power=
 within him. The emblem on his chest, luminates with a blinding light, whic=
h can only be produced by the power of the Matrix of Leadership. He goes qu=
iet for just a moment. Then, he opens his eyes and stands tall and solid.

=
"LIGHT OUR DARKEST HOUR!"

A powerful beam of light bursts free from the lu=
minated Autobot insginia and first heads toward Darkhawk, bouncing off Scor=
ponok and Scourge on the way toward him! As it does so, it seems to split o=
ff, and streak through closed doors and into other rooms, as if seeking out=

In the mean time, Tucson Prime falters slightly,=

 It was an act of his own heart, of his compassion, of his love, and the on=

shift.

 fingers - crossed."

e, you're runn'n outa power. "

 right."

Elder! Tucson Prime just used some sorta energy and now his levels are drop=

Tucson Prime fight=

There was no doubt about it, =
He was pushing his own spark to the max. But when it came down to everythin=

on his feet for a moment, and then, he collapses. Night Shift is quick to g=
o by his side.
